questions.question: In writing the essay for the SAT, you should

choices.answer: describe how the author makes the point.
spend most of your time summarizing the information.
spending more than a sentence or two describing the point of the passage.
capture some of the main ideas in your analysis.

questions.question: Your essay should not explain whether or not you agree with the author's claims.
The types of evidence you should expect to find in the expert essay prompt include:

choices.answer: results of experiments or other  research

questions.question: To understand material better, some students use screen recording apps to create their own lectures.
In trying to stay focused for study, it is generally a good idea to

choices.answer: take breaks when you need them.
study only when the mood strikes you.
try using music without vocals as background.

questions.question: When preparing for the SAT, it is unimportant to review your mistakes.

choices.answer: know what works for you and stick to it.
practice only the parts that are easiest for you.

questions.question: In preparing for the SAT, you should
On the night before the SAT, you should stay up as late as possible and fall asleep to the noise of a good action film.

choices.answer: try to steer clear of nervous people at the test site.
avoid caffeinated beverages unless it is part of your normal routine.
arrive at the test site right before the test is scheduled to begin.

questions.question: You should always try out various testing strategies before the testing day.
